title: My PC beeps but won't turn on what should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Computer beeping is may because of two reason RAM may not correctly inserted.Hard drive isn't connect properly.Clean and fix properly… This may happen if you use your system roughly… If you hear 1 beep it may video card issue 2 beep it may RAM issue Continuous beep it is processor issue Hear the beep thoroughly and make sure what problem

Hi. Its code all depends on the BIOS system. There is different kind of beep for different BIOS. Some BIOS are AMI,DELL,HP,COMPAQ,MAC.,ETC If you are using HP or AMI then BIOS, Two short beep indicates RAM problem, sometimes RAM gets fails or else it might have dust or improperly placed. For more how to remove and resolve this you can get from this video.I will share here and complete this procedure.
